pkgmetadata.longdescription: Micro-Macro Analysis for Social Networks // Estimates micro effects on macro structures (MEMS) and average micro mediated effects (AMME). URL: https://github.com/sduxbury/netmediate. BugReports: https://github.com/sduxbury/netmediate/issues. Robins, Garry, Phillipa Pattison, and Jodie Woolcock (2005) doi:10.1086/427322. Snijders, Tom A. B., and Christian E. G. Steglich (2015) doi:10.1177/0049124113494573. Imai, Kosuke, Luke Keele, and Dustin Tingley (2010) doi:10.1037/a0020761. Duxbury, Scott (2023) doi:10.1177/00811750231209040. Duxbury, Scott (2024) doi:10.1177/00811750231220950.
